attributes.action: Defy the Euro Court and Kick out Abu Qatada
attributes.additional_details: The government must act straight away and deport Abu Qatada upon his release from prison and not allow the European Courts dictate to us what we can and can't do in our country. We elect our MP's etc to protect the rights of our citizens and this man should not be allowed to remain in the country as he has links to the biggest terrorist organisation in the world and puts our National Security at risk.
